title: Hello Riot, Please.
body:
Hello Riot Games, I would enjoy if you would give me a little bit of rp so that i can buy Blood Moon Yasuo. I bought Yasuo and i need a little more RP so that i can buy Blood Moon Yasuo. I would be happy if you would give me 75 RP please. I currently have 900 RP . 

I would sincerely appreciate 75 RP.

-Thanks

replies.body: Could definitely make this work! Would you mind making a quick sketch of a like....maybe a blood moon inspired poro as a trade for that 75 RP? Could be any kind of sketch really, so link that here and I'll make sure that RP makes it onto your account ^_^!
http://prntscr.com/i8mxmc Here.. A Quick Sketch Of A Blood Moon Poro.. I Don't Draw That Good Sooo.... Yeah.
Aaaaaahhhhhhh it's so precious!!!! Make sure you check your RP the next time you login ^_^!!
